annotations: Sir Richard Butler , 60 - year - old chairman of Agricola -LRB- U.K . -RRB- Ltd. , was named chairman of County NatWest Investment Management Ltd. , the investment management subsidiary of County NatWest Ltd. , the investment banking arm of this British bank .
Sir Richard succeeds John Plastow , who resigned in July .
Sir Richard is also a non-executive director at National Westminister Bank and NatWest Investment Bank Ltd .
